name: 90-90 Hip Switch
desc: Sit, knees at 90/90. Rotate without using your hands. Don't complain.

name: Cat-Cow
desc: On all fours. Arch and round. Segment by segment.

name: Freeform Dancing
desc: Move like no one is watching for 60 seconds. Total chaos is the goal.

name: Deep Squat Internal Rotation
desc: In a deep squat, drop one knee to the floor inward. Alternate.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
desc: Lunge, inside elbow to floor, then reach same arm to the sky.

name: Prone Scorpions
desc: Lying on stomach, arms out. Reach one foot over to the opposite hand.

name: Iron Cross
desc: Lying on back, arms out. Reach one foot over to the opposite hand.

name: Cobra Stretch
desc: Lying on stomach. Push up with hands, keep hips down. Look up.

name: Child's Pose
desc: Kneel, sit on heels, reach forward. Rest your forehead on the floor.

name: Beast Hold
desc: On all fours, toes tucked. Lift knees 1 inch off floor. Hold.

name: Crab Reach
desc: Sitting, hands behind you. Lift hips and reach one arm over and back.

name: Adductor Rock Backs
desc: On one knee, other leg straight out to side. Rock hips back to heel.

name: Hip Circles (Quadruped)
desc: On all fours. Draw the biggest circle possible with your knee.

name: Fire Hydrants
desc: On all fours. Lift knee out to the side like a dog. Keep hips level.

name: Bird-Dog
desc: On all fours. Opposite arm and leg reach. Keep back flat.

name: Dead Bug
desc: On back. Opposite arm and leg lower. Keep lower back glued to floor.

name: Glute Bridge
desc: On back, knees bent. Drive heels down, lift hips. Squeeze at the top.

name: Single Leg Glute Bridge
desc: Same as bridge but one leg in the air. Balance and power.

name: Windshield Wipers
desc: On back, knees bent. Drop knees slowly from side to side.

name: Happy Baby
desc: On back. Grab the outside of your feet. Pull knees toward armpits.

name: Kneeling Lat Stretch
desc: On knees. Arms on a bench or floor far ahead. Sink chest down.

name: Crouching Tiger
desc: From pushup position, push hips back to heels, knees hovering. Spring forward.

name: Lateral Lunge
desc: Step wide to the side. Keep one leg straight, sink deep into the other.

name: Spiderman Lunge
desc: Step into a deep lunge. Place both hands inside the front foot.

name: Duck Walk
desc: Stay in a deep squat. Walk forward. Don't stand up.

name: Bear Crawl
desc: On all fours, knees hovering. Walk forward and back. Quiet hands and feet.

name: Gorilla Shuffle
desc: Deep squat. Reach hands to side and hop your feet over.

name: Plank to Downward Dog
desc: Start in plank. Push hips back and up into a V-shape.

name: Shin Box Switch
desc: Sit with legs in 90/90. Switch sides without using hands.

name: Prone Y-T-W Raises
desc: Lying on stomach. Lift arms in Y, then T, then W shapes.

name: Lying Shoulder Internal Rotation
desc: On side, arm at 90 degrees. Use other hand to push wrist to floor.

name: Cossack Squat (Heel Up)
desc: Lateral lunge, but turn the straight leg's toes to the ceiling.

name: Jefferson Curl (Bodyweight)
desc: Stand tall. Roll down one vertebra at a time until you touch toes.

name: Plantar Fascia Stretch
desc: Kneel with toes tucked. Sit back on your heels. Pure agony.

name: Tibialis Raise
desc: Back against wall, feet out. Lift toes toward shins. Bulletproof knees.

name: Kneeling Hip Flexor Stretch
desc: One knee down. Tuck pelvis under. Lean forward 1 inch.

name: Reverse Tabletop
desc: Hands and feet on floor, chest to sky. Lift hips high.

name: Shoulder Dislocates (No Stick)
desc: Big arm circles. Keep arms straight. Reach far back.

name: Single Leg RDL (Balance)
desc: Hinge at hip on one leg. Reach back with other foot. Keep hips square.

name: Toe Points and Flexes
desc: Sit with legs out. Point toes hard, then flex back hard.

name: Sitting Cross-Legged Lean
desc: Sit cross-legged. Reach hands as far forward as possible.

name: Lying Chest Stretch (Floor)
desc: On stomach, one arm out. Roll your body away from that arm.

name: The Pancake Stretch
desc: Sit, legs as wide as possible. Lean forward from the hips.

name: Eye Circles
desc: Keep head still. Roll eyes in the largest circle possible. Brain mobility.

name: Tongue to Roof
desc: Push tongue to roof of mouth. Open and close jaw. Relax the jaw.

name: Finger Splay
desc: Spread fingers as wide as possible. Make a fist. Repeat.

name: Ear Pulls
desc: Gently pull your ears out and back. Trust me, it feels good.

name: Standing Shake-off
desc: Literally just shake your hands and feet like they are wet.

name: Primal Squat Breathe
desc: Deep squat. Take 5 deep breaths, expanding your back.

name: Kneeling Forearm Stretch
desc: On all fours, fingers facing you. Rock back gently.

name: Reverse Forearm Stretch
desc: On all fours, back of hands on floor, fingers facing you.

name: Standing Pelvic Tilts
desc: Hands on hips. Move only your pelvis forward and back (tuck/untuck).

name: Neck Side Glide
desc: Keep head level. Shift your neck side to side like a pigeon.

name: Thoracic Windmill
desc: Lie on side, knees tucked. Open your top arm like a book to the other side.

name: Full Body Yawn and Stretch
desc: Fake a yawn and stretch every limb simultaneously. Animals do it for a reason.
